title: ATC postpones hearing against PTI activists in May 9 case
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP):An Anti-Terrorism Court (ATC) on Monday postponed hearing against PTI workers in a case registered by Ramna Police Station with regard to May 9 riots.
ATC Judge Tahir Abbas Supra heard the case. During the hearing, accused Zaryab did not appear in the court and he filed a request for exemption from attendance.
The court postponed the verdict in the case due to the unavailability of the accused and adjourned the hearing till
During the previous hearing, section-342 statements were signed by the accused. PTI workers, including MNA Abdul Latif, and former provincial minister Wazirzada Kailashi, are named in the case.
